monsters.name: Blightbound Dryads
monsters.damage_resistances: Necrotic, Psychic; Bludgeoning and Piercing from Nonmagical Attacks

traits.name: Corrupted Roots
traits.desc: The dryad's blight infects the ground. Difficult terrain extends in a 10 ft. radius around her unless she chooses otherwise.

traits.name: Blighted Charm
traits.desc: As an actionthe dryad can attempt to beguile one humanoid she can see within 30 feet. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed for 1 minute. While charmed this waythe creature is poisoned. The target can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns.

actions.name: Thornlash (Melee)
actions.desc: +4 to hitreach 10 ft.one target. Hit - 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be pulled 5 feet closer to the dryad.

actions.name: Vineburst (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Roots erupt in a 15 ft. cone. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 2d6 necrotic damage and be restrained until the end of their next turn.

bonus_actions.name: Twisting Veil
bonus_actions.desc: The dryad becomes lightly obscured in shadow and decay until the start of her next turngiving her +2 AC against ranged attacks.

reactions.name: Root Snare
reactions.desc: When a creature within 5 feet movesthe dryad can attempt to entangle it. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or have its speed reduced to 0 until the end of its turn.

monsters.name: Corrupted Vine Horror
monsters.damage_resistances: Bludgeoning and Piercing from Nonmagical Attacks
monsters.senses: Blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), Passive Perception 10
monsters.languages: Understands Common and Sylvan but cannot speak

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the vine horror remains motionlessit is indistinguishable from a tangle of corrupted vines.

traits.name: Corrupted Terrain
traits.desc: The vine horror causes the area in a 10-foot radius around it to become difficult terrain for non-plant creatures.

actions.name: Constrict (Melee)
actions.desc: +4 to hitreach 10 ft.one creature. Hit - 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damageand the target is grappled (escape DC 12). Until the grapple endsthe target is restrainedand the vine horror can’t constrict another target.

actions.name: Corruption Pulse (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: The vine horror emits a wave of toxic pollen. Each creature within 10 ft. must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of their next turn.

bonus_actions.name: Creeping Roots
bonus_actions.desc: The vine horror moves up to 10 feet by burrowing beneath the soil. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.

reactions.name: Tangle Reflex
reactions.desc: When a creature within 5 feet hits the vine horror with a melee attackvines lash out in retaliation. The attacker must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or have their speed halved until the end of their next turn.

monsters.name: Flickering Dragonkin Spirit
monsters.damage_resistances: Fire, Lightning, Psychic; Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from Nonmagical Attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: Charmed, Frightened, Grappled, Paralyzed, Petrified, Poisoned, Prone, Restrained
monsters.languages: Draconic, understands Common but can’t speak

traits.name: Flickering Form
traits.desc: The spirit shimmers erratically. Attack rolls against it have disadvantage the first time a creature targets it on their turn.

traits.name: Ethereal Glimmer
traits.desc: The dragonkin can partially phase out of realitygiving it resistance to force damage.

actions.name: Spirit Claw (Melee)
actions.desc: +4 to hitreach 5 ft.one target. Hit- 6 (1d6 + 3) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or have disadvantage on its next attack roll.

actions.name: Flickering Howl (1/Day)
actions.desc: Emits a haunting roar. Each creature within 10 ft. must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened until the end of their next turn.

bonus_actions.name: Drift Step
bonus_actions.desc: The dragonkin can move up to 20 feet without provoking opportunity attacks.

reactions.name: Echo Dodge
reactions.desc: When hit by an attackthe dragonkin can vanish momentarilycausing the attacker to reroll the attack with disadvantage (1/short rest).

monsters.name: Ghostly Monk Initiates
monsters.damage_resistances: Acid, Fire, Lightning, Thunder; Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from Nonmagical Attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: Charmed, Exhaustion, Frightened, Grappled, Paralyzed, Petrified, Poisoned, Prone, Restrained

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The ghost can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Ethereal Step
traits.desc: The monk can enter the Ethereal Plane from the Material Planeor vice versaas a bonus action.

actions.name: Ghost Fist (Melee)
actions.desc: +4 to hitreach 5 ft.one target. Hit -  6 (1d6 + 2) force damage. Target must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or be stunned until the end of their next turn.

actions.name: Martial Echo (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: The monk makes two spectral strikes. Each strike must target a different creature.

bonus_actions.name: Step of the Shades
bonus_actions.desc: The monk may Dash or Disengage using ghostly momentum without provoking opportunity attacks.

reactions.name: Ghost Counter
reactions.desc: When a creature misses the monk with a melee attackthe monk can make one Ghost Fist attack against that creature.

monsters.name: Hollowfang Wolf
monsters.damage_resistances: Necrotic, Cold; Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from Nonmagical Attacks
monsters.languages: Understands Common and Sylvan, cannot speak

traits.name: Undead Nature
traits.desc: The Hollowfang Wolf does not require airfooddrinkor sleep.

traits.name: Pack Ambush
traits.desc: The wolf has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Haunting Howl (Recharge 6)
traits.desc: As an actionthe wolf releases a terrifying howl. Each creature within 30 feet that can hear it must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of their next turn.

actions.name: Hollow Bite (Melee)
actions.desc: +5 to hitreach 5 ft.one target. Hit -  11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damageand the target must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or take 5 (1d10) necrotic damage as soul essence is drained.

actions.name: Pounce
actions.desc: If the wolf moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a bite attack on the same turnthat target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

bonus_actions.name: Shadowstep
bonus_actions.desc: The Hollowfang can teleport up to 20 feet to an unoccupied space it can see in dim light or darkness.

reactions.name: Evasive Dash
reactions.desc: When a creature misses the Hollowfang with a melee attackit can move up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.
